definition: to fix a leak (in a roof, pipe etc)/to check for leaks
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Visual and holiday detection of the bend coating.
sentences.chinese: 目测外观及火花检漏仪检测弯管防腐层。

sentences.english: The leak detection hole axis should pass the middle of two neighboring studs clearance holes.
sentences.chinese: 检漏孔中心线应对两相邻螺柱通孔跨中。

sentences.english: Only after this delay time the detectable gas can be measured by leak detector.
sentences.chinese: 只有经该延迟时间后，检漏仪才能探得信号。

sentences.english: The device simplified constitution of hardware, improved testing automatic degree.
sentences.chinese: 该装置简化了硬件构成，提高了检漏的自动化程度。

sentences.english: Put main units of the evaporator inside the chamber properly.
sentences.chinese: 将要检漏的蒸发器主件规则地放入测试箱内。

sentences.english: Leak testing should be completed on the system after each cylinder change.
sentences.chinese: 每次更换钢瓶之后，要对系统检漏。

sentences.english: Leak-check the system at its working pressure.
sentences.chinese: 在工作压力下对系统检漏。

sentences.english: An ultra-sonic leak detector can be used to detect smaller leaks.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用一个超声波检漏器来检测较小的泄漏。

sentences.english: This pepar also presents a quantitative method for calculating leak rate of leaks in leak detection by color change.
sentences.chinese: 文中还给出显色检漏中漏孔漏率的定量方法。
